songs.title: The Villains
songs.lyrics:
The Villains

[Intro: Dame D.O.L.L.A]
Dame D.O.L.L.A!

[Chorus: Dame D.O.L.L.A.]
Yeah the money good
But I’m stressing bad
Tell me something good
Yeah the hood show me love
Cause I'm reachin' for the sky
All my friends bein' loyal for each other we a die
We was villains
We was villains
We used to get ignored
Look at what he had in store
Now the light shine bright
We were knights on the floor
We was villains

[Verse 1: Dame D.O.L.L.A]
I wake up in the morning
Stare into that mirror
Look at all my messages
Acknowledge all the real ones (yeah)
Like a couple pictures just to get 'em out their feelings
Then I got to go to work
That's a shot to Jay Bilas
I, Know that that money did cause space
Folks still in the hood
I'm livin' it in the states
In the club I got a section
They livin' on section 8
Do that make me fake?
Let me know so I get it straight
The reason that I'm here cause my fam, I'm village made
Been away from home for a minute I'm feelin' strange
Hard to give 'em eye contact, I feel ashamed
Cause anything they need I could do it, should be arranged
The stuff that stress me now is relationships and the money
Place for all my whips and attention that's comin' to me
The time it take Adidas to get me that custom hoodie
The stuff that used to scare me
Back when I was a rookie
My pops say “do you”
Don't let it get to me
People think it’s all good
But the feelin' bittersweet
Get us on the same page
Need to fix the synergy
They the center of my heart
And I’m the Blazers centerpiece but
I drive around Lake Oswego
Livin' in the fairytale
The place that we grow
Like a bully to your dreams
That’s why I hated Deebo
People out here killin' each other
To make a scene though (man)
Crabs in the barrel we pull ourselves down (why?)
And that’s what be causin' our mothers meltdowns
What we provin' by walkin'
Havin' them stale frowns? (For what?)
You ain’t got a whip
And you can't go twelve rounds
I promise I'm the answer if you listenin'
You can call me A.I
And I'm the sixer him
All you juggers is worried about makin dividends
But they skippin' the steps that’s gonna help em get to them (hello?)
You could have all the money that's in the world
Every foreign car
The baddest of all the girls
All the finest jewelry
From Roleys to all the pearls
But I'd rather have the love
Like Pac and his cousin Earl (real)
It hurt the floor
Shouldn’t be away from your blood line
Even if they talk bad I still love mine
I thank the man for everything even the sunshine
Remember when any spot could have been a gun line
Real, real east Oakland where its poppin' at
All my hood partner's love me cause I holla back
All this killin' is foolish and I ain’t proud of that
Give 'em the best of both worlds they got to rock with that

[Chorus: Dame D.O.L.L.A]
Yeah the money good
But I’m stressing bad
Tell me something good
Yeah the hood show me love
Cause I'm reachin' for the sky
All my friends bein loyal for each other we a die
We was villains
We was villains
We used to get ignored
Look at what he had in store
Now the light shine bright
We were knights on the floor
We was villains

[Verse 2: Bozzle]
One of the trillest, the illest dudes you would ever meet
Come from the bottom but at the top where I'd rather be (ok)
Be thankful you blessed that’s what they tellin' me
But how am I supposed to feel when my momma ain't have a place to sleep?
And get deep, my little sisters they depend on me
All that weight on my shoulders really drainin' my energy
But I, keep it movin'
Tryna, find a solution to the problem
Tell my doubters
Watch, Ill make it without 'em
Cause it’s real now
Where we from, it’s been real
Had to get up off our ass so our fam won't miss meals
It’s a cold world
So cold you would catch chills
But my heart frozen solid from the pain I let build (for real)
I'm with the fam yeah we up in the buildin'
See my cousin get some commas
Now I want me some millions
When I look back at my past
I’m a long way from dealing
Politicin' with some bosses and we all trying to win it
Watch me kill it
A bad guy yeah they say I’m a villain
But when I die they gon' tell you I was one of the realest
Lookin down from the top, that's a wonderful feelin'
Even through the hard times I kept my head to the ceilin' (let’s get it)

[Chorus: Dame D.O.L.L.A]
Yeah the money good
But I’m stressing bad
Tell me something good
Yeah the hood show me love
Cause I'm reachin' for the sky
All my friends bein loyal for each other we a die
We was villains
We was villains
We used to get ignored
Look at what he had in store
Now the light shine bright
We were knights on the floor
We was villains

[Outro: Dame D.O.L.L.A}
We was villains
